description: Oversaw all aspects of daily operations, including staffing, scheduling, and resource allocation.

scope: Contributed to the development and testing of a new movie ticketing system, including refactoring existing code to improve its performance and readability.
Collaborated with other interns to develop a mobile chatbot using Azure LUIS and Java to handle movie inquiries and ticket reservation requests.

title: Event Game Marshal (Robocar Poli Toy Carnival)
description: Delivered customer service and support during event, promptly addressing customer requests and inquiries with efficiency.
Managed various game booths at the event, actively engaging customers to ensure a positive and enjoyable experience.
Contributed to the overall cleanliness and organization of the venue by assisting with daily housekeeping before and after operating hours.
Demonstrated strong teamwork and attention to detail by proficiently setting up and tearing down events.

title: Promoter
description: Actively promoted and successfully sold toys to customers in a retail environment.

title: IT Intern
description: Developed and deployed an ASP.NET Web Application e-Portal using C# to implement a centralized IT asset management system.
Enabled concurrent access to the e-Portal by deploying it onto the company server.

title: Associate Solution Engineer
company: Oracle CAPAC Services Unlimited Company (Singapore Branch)

scope: Acquired technical knowledge of Oracle cloud products and soft skills essential for success in a sales role.
